tool_description: Utility functions for images. Working with images has become an integral part of software systems and applications. This api focuses on solving real time problems faced by systems during formatting, updating and managing images. Transparent pricing and performant endpoints.
name: ImageUtility
title: ImageUtility

api_list.name: Image Details
api_list.description: Get basic information about an image.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://imageutility.p.rapidapi.com/imgd"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "imageutility.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Image Convert
api_list.description: The payload take in two mandatory keys , "to" ( JPG or PNG )  and "image" ( base64 encoded image). The api allows a max size of 10 MB for the payload.
